content: WE ARE GIVING 1 MILLION $IGU TOKENS to our Iguana community! üí• Starts: NOW‚è≥ Remaining: 3 MONTHS‚úÖ LINK: https://iguv.cc/1m-igu-usd-100k-giveawayüí•üí• We‚Äôre giving 1 MILLION $IGU tokens to our Iguana community! üí•üí• ‚ö°Ô∏è Total prize pool: 1,000,000 $IGU worth $100,000 on token listing‚ö°Ô∏èTotal no. of winners: 250 (Each winner will get a specific prize place);Time period: June 17, 2022, to September 20, 2022;Winning Allocation Per Prize Place:‚úÖ There will be 50 1st place winners with the token allocation of 50%, which is equal to 10,000 $IGU for each winner;‚úÖ As for the 2nd place winners, there will be 100 winning places with the 30% token allocation, meaning 3,000 $IGU for each winner;‚úÖ The 3rd place will include 100 winners with the token allocation of 20%, prescribing 2,000 $IGU for each winner.How to participate?In order to participate, click on the link and start completing the tasks that will give you a specific number of entries. For example, retweeting IguVerse on Twitter is worth 10 entries. Do not forget to refer your friends for extra 25 entries.Important to note! The more entries you have, the higher the chances to become a winner in the IguVerse giveaway!https://ibb.co/HtGgWD9
